data.text:
Reduction in time taken to develop aviators.‚ôªÔ∏è‚úàÔ∏è For a period of 8 months each year, future generation of aviators are equipped with the needed basic knowledge and understanding of each career. With key topics and subjects explained, we reduce the time taken to develop aviators as basic knowledge and understanding of what the career is all about is covered, helping approved training organizations increase performance. This is one of our key areas of impact in digital transformation in aviation skills development. Signup today to attend https://lnkd.in/dR42siHP NGAP Here to develop aviation future workforce. #aviation #mentorship #develop #ngap #digitalmentorship

Post Brexit, deciding between a UK CAA or Dual UK CAA & EASA licence is crucial when looking to start your pilot training. ü§∑ Leading Edge Aviation is authorised by both the UK CAA & EASA for Flight Training. We provide the option to acquire a UK CAA licence or to broaden your job prospects by holding both licenses. üëèüöÄ Why not maximise your post graduation employment opportunities with a Dual licence? Find out more about the benefits of a Dual licence: https://zurl.co/Zb4W #LeadingEdgeAviation #PilotTrainingAcademy #PilotTraining #FlightSchool #CommercialPilot #ATPL #PPL #Aviation #FlightTraining

LEAP is our full-time, integrated flying programme that can take you from zero experience to a fully qualified commercial pilot in just 18 months and includes a BSc degree in Air Transport Management with Airline Pilot Training. ‚úàÔ∏è` MAP is our modular course and allows you to train towards becoming a commercial pilot in stages on either a full or part-time basis. Providing you with the option to train around existing commitments such as work and family. Although both LEAP and MAP result in a frozen ATPL, there are some key differences to bear in mind. Key Differences üåü ‚úÖAccommodation is included with the LEAP course, whereas MAP students can book accommodation with us at an extra cost or choose to train from home (if they are local enough) ‚úÖThe flexible nature of the modular route allows you to ‚Äòearn as you learn‚Äô and can be completed more easily alongside existing work, family or other commitments, whereas LEAP is a full-time, integrated pilot training programme. ‚úÖGraduate Services, included in the LEAP course fee Get in touch with us today to learn more about the courses and training services we provide via the link! https://lnkd.in/dCAAx5U #LeadingEdgeAviation #PilotTrainingAcademy #PilotTraining #FlightSchool #CommercialPilot #ATPL #PPL #Aviation #FlightTraining

üöÄ Ready to Soar in the Skies? üåç At Young Learners Aviation Academy, we don't just prepare you for an aviation career‚Äîwe equip you with the tools to excel! Our #comprehensivegroundtraining is led by certified pilots, including Captain Nitin Bendre, a seasoned #commercialpilot with years of experience. Under his expert guidance, our students are primed to ace the #DGCAexams and connect with leading #flyingschools both in India and abroad. Our #pilottraining programs are crafted to meet the rigorous standards of the #aviationindustry, ensuring you are fully prepared for a successful career. Whether you're aiming for a #national or #internationalaviation career, our academy offers the support, expertise, and connections to help you achieve your dreams. Join Young Learners Aviation Academy and take flight with confidence! üåü or, Share this with someone who dreams of becoming a pilot! Comment down below if you've ever dreamed of becoming a pilot, and let us know where you'd love to fly first! #AviationTraining #DGCApreparation #AviationCareers #FuturePilots #AviationEducation #YoungLearnersAviation #AviationAspirations #GlobalPilotTraining #CareerInAviation

I've been focusing on coaching in recent months, so today it was really great to switch gears and get back in the training room teaching aviation English to this group of enthusiastic students, all hoping to become airline pilots, and from what I've seen today, they have what it takes. I pushed them outside their comfort zones, giving them plenty of speaking practice in the context of giving directions, and talking about airport layouts and runway incursions. We have 3 more immersive days to build their skills and confidence which comes from good practice and repetition. #aviationenglish #communicationskills #icaoenglish #confidenceiskey #mindsetmatters
